title: Amazon Sponsored Brands Attributed Purchases Daily Report
description: Daily report for attributed purchases in Amazon Sponsored Brands

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'

Currency.description: Currency code for the amounts, e.g., 'INR'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the sponsored brands campaign

Purchased_ASIN.description: ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) of the purchased product

14_Day_Total_Sales.description: Details of total sales for the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Orders.description: Total number of orders placed in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units.description: Total number of units purchased in the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Sales.description: Details of new-to-brand sales for the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Orders.description: Number of new-to-brand orders in the last 14 days

14_Day_New_to_brand_Units.description: Number of new-to-brand units purchased in the last 14 days

14_Day_of_Sales_New_to_brand.description: Percentage of total sales attributed to new-to-brand purchases in the last 14 days

14_Day_of_Orders_New_to_brand.description: Percentage of total orders attributed to new-to-brand purchases in the last 14 days

14_Day_of_Units_New_to_brand.description: Percentage of total units attributed to new-to-brand purchases in the last 14 days
